text.section: There is a State Lottery Fund.

Except as otherwise specifically provided by law:
the Agency shall account to the Comptroller for all of the revenue under this subtitle; and
the Comptroller shall credit the revenues to the State Lottery Fund.

A system of voucher deposits may be used for:
payout of prizes;
payout of commissions; and
reimbursement for money paid out for prizes or commissions.
